titleStmt.title: Northern Nanny, or, The Loving lasses lamentation ... tune of, In January last &c.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, J. Wright, and J. Clark,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication from Wing (2nd ed.)
Imperfect: stained and cropped; printed as single sheet, now in two parts.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
